Proximity_Encryption_Suite

Class Device_Monitoring_Thread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Proximity_Encryption_Suite.Device_Monitoring_Thread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, javax.bluetooth.DiscoveryListener

    public class Device_Monitoring_Thread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements javax.bluetooth.DiscoveryListener
    The Device_Monitoring_Thread.Java Class implements an method of checking the status of a connection between a mobile device and the application.
    Since:
    18-01-2014
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Harry Clewlow (C012952A)
